name: 'Riley' Apron Knot Dress for Your 18 Inch Doll
description:
A matching dress for your doll! This dress fits all 18" dolls including American Girl dolls and Madame Alexander dolls.

All items are handcrafted with love in our smoke free home studio in WA state. Seams are professionally finished and topstitched where necessary.

100% Cotton Fabric
Machine Wash Gentle
Line Dry or Tumble Dry Low

name: 'Riley' Girls Pleated Peasant Dress
description:
RILEY---

Absolutely stunning pleated peasant dress with bottom band and just a touch of trim.This peasant dress is a longer version, almost to the ankle. Trim may vary but always coordinates fabulousy!

Available in girls sizes 2, 4, 6, 8, 10, and 12 


Please allow up to 2-3 weeks after ordering for your dress to ship, but it is usually much sooner!

Care Instructions:
Machine Wash Cold
Line Dry or Tumble Dry Low
Iron as Needed
Take care to not iron the trims

100% Cotton Fabric

Handcrafted with love in our smoke free home studio in WA state. All seams are professionally finished and top stitched where needed.

name: 'Riley' Girls Top and Double Ruffle Capris Set
description:
RILEY---

The Sophie Top is a classic staple which coordinates with almost anything. It's fun and comfy and can easily be layered when it's cold outside, or worn alone when the weather is warmer. The adjustable tie straps make for easy dressing. The trim on each top may vary, but always coordinates fabulously!

 Ruffle pants are an essential in any girls wardrobe. They can be dressed up or down, and are always cute and comfy. This pair boasts two big ruffles, for extra fun.

This set is made to order, therefore may take up to 2-3 weeks to ship, but it's usually much sooner =)

100% Cotton Fabric
Machine Wash Gentle
Line Dry 
Iron as Needed (take care not to iron directly on the trim)

Handcrafted with love in our smoke free home studio in WA state.

All seams are professionally finished and topstitched where neccessary

name: 'Riley' Girls Apron Knot Dress
description:
RILEY---

 This knot dress is perfect for cheering up those winter duldrums with its bright cheery colors. Little girls and moms alike love knot dresses. They are sweet, flattering, easy on and off, and leave plenty of room for her to grow.
 
Available in Girls Sizes 2 4 6 8 10 and 12

This item is made to order, therefore, please allow up to 2-3 weeks after ordering for your dress to ship, but it usually much sooner =)

Care Instructions:

Line Dry or Tumble Dry Low
Iron as Needed

100% Cotton Fabric

Handcrafted with love in our smoke free home studio in WA state. All seams are professionally finished and top stitched where needed.
